creator: flawlor@athensgroup.com
text:
If I add a Context element to server.xml for my app, it encounters errors when 
I try to deploy a new version of the app by placing a new myapp.war file in 
webapps and deleting the old myapp directory.  This does not happen if there is 
not Context element in server.xml.

This makes deployment tedious and disruptive since I need to modify server.xml 
to comment out the Context entry, deploy the app, modify server.xml.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
I'm afraid it won't work. Your best solution is to stop the context, overwrite
files in the directory, and start the context again.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 4829 ***
